text: Fresh Beat Band of Spies is an animated children's television series that aired on Nickelodeon and the Nick Jr. Channel. It is a spin-off of Nickelodeon's live-action series The Fresh Beat Band. The series aired from June 15, 2015 to February 24, 2016.
